house_listing.house_description: Beautiful Italian Renaissance Style 2 story home. Part of the orginal "Silk Stocking Row" in the Castle Court Addition. This home does have many wonderful features which includes its low-pitched, hipped roof covered by ceramic tile, the upper-story windows smaller and less elaborate than the windows below; the full-length first-story windows with arches above and an entrance area accented by small classical pilasters. Why not make this wonderful place something called home?
